caption: A fighter jet soars through the sky, controlled by the pilot who maneuvers the joystick while the engine roars with flames propelling the aircraft forward. The pilot performs a series of daring aerobatic maneuvers, showcasing precision skills. In a training scenario, the pilot locks onto a target aircraft while their teammates observe closely.The climax arrives in an aerial combat scene over the ocean. Two aircraft engage in a thrilling pursuit. The trailing plane fires missiles and shoots bullets at the leading one. The pilots in the targeted aircraft communicate nervously, teetering on the brink. In the nick of time, the pursuing aircraft is taken down by a friendly plane, averting disaster.
